assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Ravindra Kolhe has received honoraria, and/or travel funding, and/or research support from Illumina, Asuragen, QIAGEN, Perkin Elmer Inc, Bionano Genomics, Agena, Agendia, PGDx, Thermo Fisher Scientific, Cepheid, and BMS. Nikhil Sahajpal owns limited number of personal stocks of Bionano Genomics Inc. However, no members of Bionano were involved in this study. The rest of the authors have no relevant financial or non-financial interests to disclose.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was approved by the IRB at the Medical College of Georgia at Augusta University.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was obtained from all individual participants included in the study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This is not applicable as no personal data were included in the manuscript.
